title: registration error???
body: http://prntscr.com/1uqi4k I brought fizz and his skin 2 weeks ago and now its showing his skin as if i need to buy this again http://prntscr.com/1uqj7r

replies.body:
Hi MJB!

This indeed seemed incredibly odd.  Because of this, I went ahead and performed an in-depth audit of your account.  From this audit, I went ahead and refreshed your Fizz skin on your account.  You should not be able to select it in Champion Selection!

I wish you the best of luck with your new Fizz Skin!  ^.^

I assume since you're posting this here, you can't select it in game, either? 

Your best bet is to submit a support ticket here: https://support.leagueoflegends.com/home
